price: 12. Dan sesungguhnya kami (jin) telah menduga, bahwa kami tidak akan mampu melepaskan diri (dari kekuasaan) Allah di bumi dan tidak (pula) dapat lari melepaskan diri (dari)-Nya.
arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعۡجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَن نُّعۡجِزَهُۥ هَرَبٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā ẓanannā an lan nuʿ'jiza al-laha fī al-arḍi walan nuʿ'jizahu haraban
